test.name: Cenário 01: Cadastrar um novo usuário com sucesso no ServeRest

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Convert To Lower Case
kw.doc: Converts string to lower case.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=ServeRest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={'accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios path_url=/usuarios headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'accept': 'application/json', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '106'} body=b'{"nome": "Tifulano da Silva", "email": "bnzs@emailteste.com", "password": "1234", "administrador": "true"}'
